ANYONE HAVING A PROBLEM WITH THIS TORRENT! Check where your file is. :) I was having the same problem until I realized the file being extracted was going, by default, to C:\Program Files\MAGIX\Movie_Edit_Pro_16_Plus_Download_Version. The program was saved, however, to my Program Files (x86) folder. Simply go to Program Files, MAGIX, Movie_Edit_Pro_16..., and copy the program from there, then paste it to your the folder within Program Files (x86), overwriting the previous file that the activation code wouldn't work for. :) I hope that fixes your issues!
